item.title: Developer Guide
item.description: Octorun is built using Kubebuilder, take a time to see the Kubebuilder documentation will be very helpful to get started with Octorun. Most of development process can be done using make command. Run make help to see available make command targets. Prerequisites # Install go v1.17+ Install docker Install kubectl v1.22+ Install Kubernetes cluster for development (eg: kind, minikube, docker-desktop) Install tilt Getting Started # We are using tilt.
